name: Nutcracker Knot Dress with Peasant Pants
description:
THIS IS A LISTING FOR A KNOT DRESS AND PEASANT PANTS, THE FABRICS ARE FUN AND SASSY

THE KNOT DRESS IS SO VERSATILE, THIS DRESS CAN STAND ALONE OR CAN HAVE A TOP UNDERNEATH AS A JUMPER.
GOOD FOR SUMMER OR WINTER


I MADE THIS IN OUR SMOKE FREE AND PET FREE HOME.

PLEASE STATE WHAT SIZE YOU WANT WHEN ITEM IS PAID .

PLEASE DON'T HESITATE TO CONTACT ME WITH ANY QUESTIONS YOU MIGHT HAVE

SIZES 7 and 8 ARE AN ADDTIONAL $5

IF YOU WOULD LIKE MATCHING PEASANT PANTS THEY ARE $25 

THANK YOU FOR LOOKING!GOD BLESS YOU!! 



Knot Dress
6-12 months (Chest 19" length 17")
12-18 month (Chest 20" length 18.5")
18-24 month (Chest 21" length 20")
2t (Chest 22" length 21.5")
3t (Chest 23" length 23")
4t (Chest 24" length 24")
5 (Chest 25" length 25")
6 (Chest 26" length 26")
7 (Chest 27" length 28")
8 (Chest 28" length 29.5) 

Pants
 6-12 m (17" elastic waist, 9 " inseam)
 12-18m (17" elastic waist, 10" inseam)
 18-24 (18" elastic waist, 11" inseam)
 2T (18 elastic waist, 13" inseam)
 3T (19" elastic waist, 14" inseam)
 4T (20" elastic waist, 15" inseam)
 5 (21" elastic waist, 17" inseam)
 6 (22" elastic waist, 19" inseam)
 7 (24" elastic waist, 21" inseam)
 8 (27" elastic waist, 23" inseam)

name: SURPRISE Tie Dress
description:
Every little girl deserves to have a dress that's made especially for her! This adorable peasant made of 100% cotton designer fabric. Great for any occasion. 

How this works, you choose a style dress (this is for the Tie Dress) and the surprise is the print used.

All of our clothing is made in our smoke-free, pet-free home. All fabrics are pre-washed to prevent shrinkage
